name: Street Smasher
description:
"The smashers you've been waiting for are finally here!!"

- The Precious Child, [Kei]
- As comical as his mask, [Mask]
- Same-spot Beater, [Beat]
- Single-person Beater, [Boom]
- Dazzling Charming Punch, [Jelly]


Smash smash!! Tap tap!!
They'll grow as you smash them up.

Barrels, cows, even... aliens,
Smash up the 30 different Sandbags all you want!!
These chatterbox Sandbags will keep you in company!!

Win the Street Championship first!!
Become the No.1 Champ of this whole wide world!!

Collect 60 different Match Items!
This will lead you to the path of power.

Once per day, match with 20 Users selected from the Street!
Become the World Champ among Users from around the world!!

Only you can control their Smash!!
Only you can train them to Champ!!
Now, let's get smashin'!!
